He said: I worry about it- because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70. But I genuinely like kids. Simon Cowell also admitted Mezhgan, 36, has`` softened'' him and has finally made him think about settling down forever.
